languages.text: "Адептус Арбитес — это прогнившая, коррумпированная язва на теле Простора Коронус. Я объявляю о начале чистки их рядов. Все, кого я сочту недостойным, будут истреблены. Оставшиеся, лучшие из лучших, продолжат защищать закон".

"The Adeptus Arbites is a rotten, corrupt canker on the face of the Koronus Expanse. I declare the beginning of a purge in their ranks. All whom I deem unworthy will be exterminated. Those who remain, the best of the best, will carry on protecting the law."
languages.original_text: "Адептус Арбитес — это прогнившая, коррумпированная язва на теле Простора Коронус. Я объявляю о начале чистки их рядов. Все, кого я сочту недостойным, будут истреблены. Оставшиеся, лучшие из лучших, продолжат защищать закон".

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is a rotten, corrupt ulcer on the face of the Koronus Expanse. I declare the beginning of a purge in their ranks. All whom I deem unworthy will be exterminated. Those who remain, the best of the best, will carry on protecting the law."

"The Adeptus Arbites is a rotten, corrupt canker on the face of the Koronus Expanse. I declare the beginning of a purge in their ranks. All whom I deem unworthy will be exterminated. Those who remain, the best of the best, will carry on protecting the law."

languages.text: "Das Adeptus Arbites ist ein wucherndes Krebsgeschwür auf dem Gesicht der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Ich ordne hiermit seine Säuberung an. Wer in meinen Augen unwürdig ist, wird ausgelöscht. Alle anderen, die Besten der Besten, werden das Gesetz auch weiterhin schützen."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is a rotten, corrupt canker on the face of the Koronus Expanse. I declare the beginning of a purge in their ranks. All whom I deem unworthy will be exterminated. Those who remain, the best of the best, will carry on protecting the law."

traits.locale_text: "Das Adeptus Arbites ist ein wucherndes Krebsgeschwür auf dem Gesicht der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Ich ordne hiermit seine Säuberung an. Wer in meinen Augen unwürdig ist, wird ausgelöscht. Alle anderen, die Besten der Besten, werden das Gesetz auch weiterhin schützen."

languages.text: « L'Adeptus Arbites est un chancre purulent et corrompu sur le visage des Étendues de Koronus. Je déclare la mise en œuvre d'une purge dans leurs rangs. Tous ceux que je considère comme indignes seront exterminés. Ceux qui resteront, les meilleurs des meilleurs, continueront à défendre la loi. »
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is a rotten, corrupt canker on the face of the Koronus Expanse. I declare the beginning of a purge in their ranks. All whom I deem unworthy will be exterminated. Those who remain, the best of the best, will carry on protecting the law."

traits.locale_text: « L'Adeptus Arbites est un chancre purulent et corrompu sur le visage des Étendues de Koronus. Je déclare la mise en œuvre d'une purge dans leurs rangs. Tous ceux que je considère comme indignes seront exterminés. Ceux qui resteront, les meilleurs des meilleurs, continueront à défendre la loi. »

languages.text: “法务部是科罗努斯扩区中的烂疮。我在此宣布，对法务部所有人进行大清洗。所有我认为没有价值的人，都要立刻消灭，而那些留下来的人，精英中的精英，负责继续维护律法。”
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is a rotten, corrupt canker on the face of the Koronus Expanse. I declare the beginning of a purge in their ranks. All whom I deem unworthy will be exterminated. Those who remain, the best of the best, will carry on protecting the law."

traits.locale_text: “法务部是科罗努斯扩区中的烂疮。我在此宣布，对法务部所有人进行大清洗。所有我认为没有价值的人，都要立刻消灭，而那些留下来的人，精英中的精英，负责继续维护律法。”

languages.text: «El Adeptus Arbites es una úlcera putrefacta y corrupta que mancha la Extensión de Koronus. Ordeno que se ejecute una purga en sus filas. Aquellos a quienes yo considere indignos serán exterminados. Los que queden, los mejores de los mejores, seguirán protegiendo la ley».
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is a rotten, corrupt canker on the face of the Koronus Expanse. I declare the beginning of a purge in their ranks. All whom I deem unworthy will be exterminated. Those who remain, the best of the best, will carry on protecting the law."

traits.locale_text: «El Adeptus Arbites es una úlcera putrefacta y corrupta que mancha la Extensión de Koronus. Ordeno que se ejecute una purga en sus filas. Aquellos a quienes yo considere indignos serán exterminados. Los que queden, los mejores de los mejores, seguirán protegiendo la ley».

languages.text: 「高等裁定局はコロヌス・エクスパンスの腐敗した膿である。{mf|俺|私}は彼らの粛清の開始を宣言する。{mf|俺|私}がふさわしくないと判断した者はすべて抹殺する。残った者、優秀な者は法を守り続けるだろう」
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is a rotten, corrupt canker on the face of the Koronus Expanse. I declare the beginning of a purge in their ranks. All whom I deem unworthy will be exterminated. Those who remain, the best of the best, will carry on protecting the law."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局はコロヌス・エクスパンスの腐敗した膿である。{mf|俺|私}は彼らの粛清の開始を宣言する。{mf|俺|私}がふさわしくないと判断した者はすべて抹殺する。残った者、優秀な者は法を守り続けるだろう」

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites, Koronus Enginliği'nin yüzüne yapışmış çürük ve yoz bir kangrendir. Adeptus Arbites saflarında tasfiye protokolü başlatıyorum. Layık görmediğim herkes imha edilecek. Geriye kalanlar, en iyilerin de en iyileri olarak kanunun muhafazasını sağlamaya devam edecek."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is a rotten, corrupt canker on the face of the Koronus Expanse. I declare the beginning of a purge in their ranks. All whom I deem unworthy will be exterminated. Those who remain, the best of the best, will carry on protecting the law."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites, Koronus Enginliği'nin yüzüne yapışmış çürük ve yoz bir kangrendir. Artık Adeptus Arbites Saflarında bir tasfiye protokolü başlamıştır. Layık görmediğim herkes imha edilecek. Geriye kalanlar, en iyilerin de en iyileri, kanunun muhafazasını sağlamaya devam edecek."
